name: CSRware
tag_list: enterprise-software, sustainable-procurement, carbon-management, green-it, green-data-centers, sustainable-it, environmental-sustainability, energy-management, energy-efficient, carbon, climate-change
overview:
About CSRware®

CSRware solves a very simple problem for the enterprise - how to reduce costs, optimize resources and meet regulatory standards. Our cloud-based software suite is used by leading companies to prioritize, manage and report on their resource efficiency, carbon management and operational sustainability initiatives for internal operations and across the supply chain. CSRware offers modules on Energy & Sustainability Management (ESM) and Sustainable Supply Chain (SSC). Delivered through any Web-enabled device, our solution provides the tools required to maximize the effectiveness and ROI of corporate sustainability programs. For more information, please visit our website: http://csrware.com.

CSRware Software - Mobile Enabled:

Energy & Sustainability Management (ESM) - enterprise-class software to drive energy management, water efficiency and GHG emissions management. ESM enables business to collect, measure and take action on internal operations.

ESM-Lite - Mobile enabled application starting at $99 / month to move companies from Excel spreadsheets to an integrated data analytics platform.

Sustainable Supply Chain (SSC) software to assess, quantify, and measure supplier performance. SSC allows corrective actions to be automatically sent to the supply chain participants of large companies.

The CSRware Advantage: CSRware solutions are delivered through a simple Web-browser interface. No long, costly implementations. No hardware and software to maintain. Get up and running quickly, with seamless upgrades and robust flexibility and scalability. Unlike other subscription-based solutions, CSRware is designed specifically to meet the needs of Sustainability program managers.

The CSRware Platform: Our software platform and data center environment were designed to provide business continuity by experts who continuously work with our customers to improve performance, security and reliability.
